content:
System: NixOS 24.05
When I add elan to my configuration.nix to install elan 3.1.1, it is installed successfully. But when I use leanc I got error message as follows:

/home/timechess/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.7.0-rc1/bin/leanc: line 2: /home/timechess/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.7.tmp/bin/leanc.orig: No such file or directory

It seems that the toolchain installed by elan is confused with the path. The correct path should be:

/home/timechess/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---v4.7.0-rc1/bin/leanc.orig

instead of something with tmp. Is there anybody that encountered the same problem?

Scott Morrison 发言道：

Is this https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/270676-lean4/topic/elan.203.2E1.2E0.2F3.2E1.2E1.20on.20Nixpkgs/near/425067332?

Yes, that helps. Thanks!
Yicheng Tao has marked this topic as resolved.
